# Input parameters

```{r input-parameters}
params
if (!dir.exists(params[['outdir']])) {
   dir.create(params[['outdir']], recursive = T)
}
save(params, file=file.path(params$outdir,"params.RData"))
```

# Read repertoires


```{r}
# Read repertoires
db_files <- strsplit(params[['input']], ",")[[1]]

# Check input file
lapply(db_files, function(x) {
    if (!file.exists(x)) {
        stop(paste0("File ", basename(x), " doesn't exist."))
    }
})


db <- bind_rows(lapply(db_files, read_rearrangement))

input_size <- nrow(db)
is_heavy <- db[['locus']] %in% c("IGH", "TRB", "TRD")

# Fix possible presence of bulk and single cell data
na_single <- is.na(db[[params$singlecell]])
if (length(na_single)>0) {
    db[[params$singlecell]][na_single] <- FALSE
}
```

# Distance to nearest

```{r distToNearest_bulk}
if (any(db[[params$singlecell]] == F)) {
    dist_bulk <- distToNearest(db[is_heavy & db[[params$singlecell]] == F,] , 
                          fields=params$cloneby,
                          sequenceColumn="junction", 
                          vCallColumn="v_call", jCallColumn="j_call",
                          model="ham", first=FALSE, VJthenLen=TRUE, normalize="len",
                          nproc=params$nproc)
        
} else {
    dist_bulk <- data.frame()
}
```

```{r distToNearest_single}
if (any(db[[params$singlecell]] == T)) {
    dist_single <- distToNearest(db[!is_heavy & db[[params$singlecell]] == T,] , 
                          fields=params$cloneby,
                          sequenceColumn="junction", 
                          vCallColumn="v_call", jCallColumn="j_call",
                          model="ham", first=FALSE, VJthenLen=TRUE, normalize="len",
                          nproc=params$nproc,
                          cellIdColumn = params$singlecell,
                          locusColumn = "locus",
                          onlyHeavy = TRUE)
    dist_single[[params$singlecell]] <- as.logical(dist_single[[params$singlecell]])
} else {
    dist_single <- data.frame()
}
```

# Find threshold


```{r}
db <- bind_rows(dist_bulk,dist_single)
```


```{r threshold}
threshold <- findThresholdDb(db, distanceColumn="dist_nearest", method="gmm", 
                            model="gamma-gamma",
                            edge = 0.9, subsample=NULL, 
                            nproc=params$nproc, fields=params$cloneby)

threshold_summary <- gmmSummary(threshold) %>%
    summarize(mean_threshold=mean(threshold, na.rm=TRUE))
eetable(threshold_summary, "Summary of threshold values.")
```

```{r}
lapply(threshold, '[[', 'plot')
```

# Save

```{r dbpass}
# pass <- db[['collapse_pass']]

if (!is.null(params$outname)) {
    output_fn <- paste0(params$outname,"_threshold-pass.tsv")
} else {
    output_fn <- sub(".tsv$", "_threshold-pass.tsv", basename(params$input))
}

if (!is.null(params$log)) {
    log_fn <- paste0(params$log,".txt")
} else {
    log_fn <- sub("_threshold-pass.tsv$", "_command_log.txt", basename(output_fn))
}

write_rearrangement(db , file=output_fn)
write.table(threshold_summary, 
            sub("_threshold-pass.tsv$", "_threshold-summary.tsv" ,output_fn),
            quote=FALSE,sep="\t", row.names=FALSE)
cat(threshold_summary[['mean_threshold']], 
    file=sub("_threshold-pass.tsv$", "_threshold-mean.tsv" ,output_fn),
    append=F
)
```


```{r log}
cat("START> FindThreshold", file=log_fn, append=F)
cat(paste0("\nFILE> ",basename(params$input)), file=log_fn, append=T)
cat(paste0("\nOUTPUT> ",basename(output_fn)), file=log_fn, append=T)
cat(paste0("\nPASS> ",nrow(db)), file=log_fn, append=T)
cat(paste0("\nFAIL> ",input_size-nrow(db)), file=log_fn, append=T)
```
